Articles.Content:
So I'm just wondering if any 1 has modified the Kerbals? I was thinking I hate how A kerbals head is so big. It feels like the head alone would barley fit in the smaller capsules. SO I was wondering if any 1 has modded the looks of the kerbals to have more proportioned heads and also the Space suits helmet?

I've googled for a mod like this and no result. Edited November 24, 2015 by Dermeister
I've only seen mods that replace the textures, the models haven't been changed by a mod AFAIK.
